title.native: 邪神ちゃんドロップキック

description:
The demon Jashin-chan has been summoned to Earth by Yurine Hanazono, a girl with a knack for the occult. Unfortunately, Yurine does not actually know how to send Jashin-chan back to Hell. Now stuck on Earth, she must live at Yurine's apartment as her familiar.

The only way for Jashin-chan to return would be to kill her summoner, but this is easier said than done for the incompetent demon. Since Jashin-chan is immortal and can regenerate her body, Yurine does not hold back in attacking her with a range of weapons, punishing her in gruesome manners for her evil schemes. Jashin-chan is also often visited by her demon friends: the kindhearted Gorgon Medusa and the energetic minotaur Minosu, who seem much more well-behaved in contrast, and disapprove of her plans to kill Yurine.

(Source: MAL Rewrite)
hashtag: #邪神ちゃんドロップキック
synonyms: Un calcio volante al mio demonio!

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Satire
tags.description: Prominently features the use of comedy or ridicule to expose and criticise social phenomena.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Homeless
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is homeless.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

node.description:
__Residence:__ Sendai, Miyagi, Japan

[Website](http://sasakirico.com/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/ricomotion1/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sasakirico)

Rico Sasaki is a voice actor and singer. She is the vocalist and lead guitarist of the band [Ave Mujica](https://anilist.co/staff/353935/Ave-Mujica).

[Website](https://www.miura-yutaro.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yutaro_3ura) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yutaro_3ura/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/yutaro-miura/)

A Japanese singer-songwriter. He married the voice actor and musician [Yui Makino](https://anilist.co/staff/95089/Yui-Makino) on June 12, 2020.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Hiroki_Chura)

The current director of Chura Sound.

__[Profile (Scoop Music)](https://www.scoop.co.jp/creator/detail.php?cd=2)__

__Kazuhiro Hara__ is a Japanese keyboardist, pianist, guitarist, programmer, composer and arranger.

__[Profile (Scoop Music)](https://www.scoop.co.jp/creator/detail.php?cd=35)__

__Birthplace:__ Mutsu City, Aomori Prefecture, Japan

__Tomoya Kawasaki__ is a Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger and guitarist.

[Profile (SUPA LOVE)](http://supalove.com/category/introduction/miyajima-junko/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Junko_Miyajima)

__Miyajima Junko__ is a lyricist affiliated with SUPA LOVE.
